duties_responsibilities.duty: Drafting Architectural sets using AutoCAD and Revit
Working in a multi-disciplinary office environment and multi-tasking
Interpreting NYC and New York State building codes
Observing, evaluating, and documenting site conditions and compiling written reports
Communicating with Clients and conducting site meetings

education_certification.credential: Bachelors of Architecture or an equivalent professional degree from an Accredited University/College
